TEXT: Your words are as pathetic as you are! A wasted life, with no useful service.
Blathering and blundering about, right into my trap…
Shut up and die before my finely deployed forces!
Witness my majestic counter maneuverer!
You dare to speak to me? You have no abilities or merit of any sort.
You belittle yourself with your elementary force deployment!
Talk all you want – your maneuvers will be countered.
Employing the 'deceive the heavens to cross the sea' stratagem? Very wise…
Silence!  I shall not devour what nonsense you're talking now.
You are truly a pathetic creature, who ought to lie low and preserve your meager fortunes.
You are all bluster with no substance, no skill!
You shall be swept aside by my divine tactics!
An incorrect time to deploy the 'lure a tiger off its mountain lair' stratagem…
Enough! I shall not suffer surly worms like you!
You bore me! In terms of undeserved recognition, none can surpass you.
Do you intend to fight this poorly?
Do you ever stop attempting such trickery?
Your bravado outmatches your skill! What arrogance!
Particularly pathetic!
No, no, that won't do. I will not fall for your trickery.
Talk, talk, talk! Always wagging your tongue too freely.
Miscreant! Silence you simpleton!
You lack honour, scurry away and hide in dark places befitting of the rat you are.
Your words are as spineless as a dog with a broken backbone.
Oh, is this a tactic taught to the diminutive of mind?
You continue to talk, clucking about as a squatting hen.
This tactic, is it of your own creation? Revealing indeed…
You reveal your abominable nature clearly.
Who are you to challenge my stratagems!?
This simply does not appear like the wisest action.
Try whatever you must, beggarly giglet!
Pathetic! What foul trickery you employ!
That was your best blow? It is clear you are physically and mentally stunted.
A pitiful attempt from a pitiful minded "warrior".
You cannot hope to match my brilliance!
I will enjoy watching you fall before my tactics!
Perhaps you should direct your prattling wind to command your men?
Fight, you fool! Stop talking as I take your head!
I shall not fall prey to the ploys of a dullard child such as you.
Are you angry? You are nothing but a slavish, brute, beast.
You are dull and lacking in ambition, as well as morals.
I will not be tricked by your 'borrow a corpse to resurrect the soul' stratagem…
Big words, small skill for one who dares defy the will of Heaven!
You speak well, for an infant lacking eloquence.
I have seen greater tactics from squawking ducks!
You look gaunt. How are your supplies?
I question your risky gambit for victory!
There is nothing you can do to weaken my resolve!
Enough expository nonsense! Retire you villain!
Your 'shut the door to catch the thief' stratagem will not surprise me…
On and on and on, nothing but foolish machinations…
If you live, try seeking wisdom instead of pleasures…
Be silent and face my blade you hoary-headed cretin!
Hah! The old 'loot a burning house' stratagem, I know it well…
Your threats are easily countered!
Unsurprising to hear such empty words from an empty minded head.
It saddens me to watch you behave so foolishly…
As expected - your words and stratagems fall short.
What a common ploy! I see through your plans!
You must expand your stratagems beyond the basic textbooks!
Ah, a classic maneuver from the military textbooks…
Your foolish ploys will be defeated here!
Your destiny is to fail to achieve your ambitions!
Your death will honestly not bring much merit!
Be patient! I will get to you in due time as I sweep the realm clean of traitors.
Quiet now, unwholesome scoundrel.
Are you compensating for your lack of ability? I shall give you a sound lashing.
Hah! The old 'stomp the grass, scare the snake' stratagem, is well known to me…
There is nothing left for you but total defeat!
Be silent, and embrace your end instead of uttering such foul words.
Your words are as pathetic as you are!
Do not waste your breath – you will need it!
Shut up and die!
I will crush you for this insult!
You dare to speak to me!
You belittle yourself with your words!
Talk all you want – you are still going to die!
I was going to let you live until now…
Silence!
You are truly a pathetic creature.
You are all show, and no skill!
You shall fall by my hand!
Stop wasting my time!
Enough! The next bout with me will be your last!
You bore me! Show me your true strength!
Do you intend to bore me to death? Lets fight!
Do you ever stop talking!?
Your bravado outmatches your skill!
Stand aside and witness how a true warrior fights!
They you are a general that prefers patience. I will give you no choice!
Talk, talk, talk!
I will kill you, if only to shut you up!
You lack honour!
Your words are spineless and so are you!
You blabber as a substitute for true strength! Pathetic!
You continue to talk, yet I hear nothing but empty noise.
One last push! That is all that is needed to crush you!
One must go to directly at the enemy for a swift victory.
Who do you think you are!?
This simply will not do.
The worst part about this is you really tried.
That was supposed to scare me?
That was your best? You are no challenge whatsoever!
A pitiful attempt from a pitiful warrior!
If you fight as well as you talk, you'll soon be dead.
I will enjoy watching you fall!
Oh, you talk as well? Fascinating.
Fight, you fool! Stop talking!
Sorry; I mistook your whining for one of my women!
Oh no…this could undo my plan…
You are lacking in talent, in every way!
I do not fear your words, or your blade!
Proud boasts from a fearful heart!
Prepare to taste my blade!
…perhaps I should reconsider my approach…
Have you eaten lately? You look gaunt.
I question your sanity!
…will I need to adjust my approach? No…I think not…
Enough expository nonsense!
Must I cut out your tongue before killing you!?
On and on and on – enough!
Don't you have a battle to lose!?
Be silent and face my blade!
I will not rise to petulant insults!
Your threats will not avail you!
Such empty, empty words!
You still have ample fight left in you I see!
Bah! The scholars will write of my deeds for years! What will they say of you?
On my life, I will silence you!
I must kill you, if only to shut you up!
Once you are dead, the silence will be bliss!
Your foolish charade ends here!
Your destiny is to die today before my fury!
Your death is a mere trifle for me, requiring no effort.
Be patient! I will get to you in due time.
Why don't you present your neck so that I may cleave your head free!
Clearly you must be compensating for your lack of martial ability.
In every corner of the land, they beg you to be silent!
There is nothing left for you but death!
Be silent, and embrace your end.
Hah! Those who are inferior in their heart always crave achievements.
Silence! I did not solicit your opinion!
A pity you believe yourself my equal!
Bah! I will never curb my ambitions!
You dare challenge me? You are unequal to such a task.
You belittle yourself with your words!
We all will fulfil our destinies this day…
I am fully prepared today, and my men are well drilled!
Silence! You incontinent whelp!
Hmm… what is this unrest I feel in my heart…
What exceedingly insignificant efforts…
I have taken precautions against all your efforts!
Hah! You will learn to kowtow to your superiors!
Enough!
I respect you, you fight well!
So what? I draw my support from the will of heaven!
On and on - like trying to chase a tiger across a stream…
Your bravado outmatches your skill!
Pathetic!
Clearly, you are resentful of those with true talent.
Talk, talk, talk!
Your temperament is know to me, I shall use it against you!
Ahhh…my worries are thus removed.
Your plans are nothing before mine.
…that won't work on me!
You continue to demonstrate ignorance of the vicissitudes of warfare!
Cease trying to demoralize with your baseless drivel!
Please, stop you're humiliating yourself.
Who do you think you are!?
This simply will not do.
Try whatever you must, shard-brained weakling!
Hmm…the omens bode ill for this…
…you continue with your vapid discourses…
I honestly expected you would feign illness to avoid battle today…
If you fight as well as you talk, you'll soon be dead.
I will enjoy watching you fall!
…and thus demonstrating you have no long term strategy!
Fight, I will not be frightened by crafty threats!
You fight as well as a mound of dumb earth.
Hah! You leap from the wolf's den to the tiger's mouth!
You are dull, in every way!
I do not fear your words, or your blade!
Hmm... Does this bode well or ill?
I suggest you review the tomes on battle…
You have abused the bounty of the Han for too long!
Have you eaten lately? You look gaunt.
I question your sanity!
There is nothing to be gained from this banter!
Enough expository nonsense!
What does this one know of war? Bah. What a fool!
On and on and on – enough!
Don't you have a battle to lose!?
Be silent and face my blade!
I will not rise to petulant insults!
Your threats will not avail you!
Such empty, empty words!
…ahh why must you press me so?
Such talk is unbecoming!
On my life, I will silence you!
I must kill you, if only to shut you up!
Once you are dead, the silence will be bliss!
Your foolish charade ends here!
But my forces have the advantage of strict discipline!
Your death will honestly be the highlight of my day.
Be patient! I will get to you in due time.
With your death I shall restore peace to the realm!
Are you compensating for your lack of ability?
In every corner of the land, they beg you to be silent!
There is nothing left for you but death!
Be silent, and embrace your end.
